skip_tests.TestTxGasSameAsBlockGasLimit: Erigon does not discard txes which exceed the gas limit immediately, but instead retains them in case the gas limit changes
skip_tests.TestVerifyL2OutputRoot: This test depends on debug_dbGet, a custom geth RPC which is not generally suported by other eth clients
skip_tests.TestVerifyL2OutputRootDetached: This test depends on debug_dbGet, a custom geth RPC which is not generally suported by other eth clients
skip_tests.TestVerifyL2OutputRootEmptyBlock: This test depends debug_dbGet, a custom geth RPC which is not generally suported by other eth clients
skip_tests.TestVerifyL2OutputRootEmptyBlockDetached: This test depends debug_dbGet, a custom geth RPC which is not generally suported by other eth clients
skip_tests.TestPendingGasLimit: This test requires changes that neither Geth nor Erigon support as CLI flags
